task.title: Import Product Catalogs into Livefyre with AEM Commerce
task.shortdesc: AEM Commerce users can seamlessly integrate their existing product catalog into Livefyre to drive user engagement in Livefyre's visualization Apps.

context.p: After you import the product catalog, the products show up in real time in your Livefyre instance. If you edit or delete items in your AEM Commerce Product Catalog, the changes automatically update in Livefrye.

step.cmd: Ensure you have the latest AEM with Livefyre package installed on your AEM instance. For more on how to set up AEM with Livefyre, see Use AEM with Livefyre.
Create a new collection or use an existing collection.
